normalised: Social Media and Influencer Marketing: Are You REALLY Knowing Your Followers?

unnormalised: **Social Media & Influencer Marketing: Are You REALLY Knowing Your Followers?**
normalised: Ever wondered who is really behind those likes and comments on your Insta posts, especially if you are an aspiring influencer from Indore? Well, follower analytics are becoming the talk of the town, helping you separate the chai-loving Auntie from the bot!

unnormalised: Ever wondered who's *really* behind those likes and comments on your Insta posts, especially if you're an aspiring influencer from Indore? Well, follower analytics are becoming the talk of the town, helping you separate the chai-loving Auntie from the bot!
normalised: Forget just counting numbers; we are talking serious insights. Which age group in Delhi digs your content the most? What time does Mumbai wake up and start scrolling? Knowing this helps boost engagement.

unnormalised: Forget just counting numbers; we're talking serious insights. Which age group in Delhi digs your content the most? What time does Mumbai wake up and start scrolling? Knowing this helps boost engagement.
normalised: Doctor Sharma from I I M Ahmedabad says businesses in India are finally catching on. "It is no longer enough to just have ten thousand followers; you need to know what they buy, what they believe, and how to reach them effectively," he explains.

unnormalised: Dr. Sharma from IIM-Ahmedabad says businesses in India are finally catching on. "It's no longer enough to just have 10,000 followers; you need to know what they buy, what they believe, and how to reach them effectively," he explains.
normalised: These tools offer detailed demographics, activity patterns, and even potential fake account detection. Think targeted ads that actually work, and sponsorships worth more than just a handful of rupees. It is like knowing the precise location to open a new paan shop - maximizing impact in a five hundred square foot space! And honestly, who does not want that?

unnormalised: These tools offer detailed demographics, activity patterns, and even potential fake account detection. Think targeted ads that actually *work*, and sponsorships worth more than just a handful of Rs. It's like knowing the precise location to open a new paan shop - maximizing impact in a 500 sq ft space! And honestly, who *doesn't* want that?
